chat.openCalendar: Opens Google Calendar in a new tab

footer.tagline: Fast, structured hiring for entry-level jobs in Georgia.

about.swipeHint: Swipe or tap to see the next card.
about.title: About Matcher
about.subtitle: A simpler way to get hired ‚Äî built for today.
about.closingLine: Matcher.ge ‚Äî your first job, in minutes. Built for Georgia. Ready for the world. Made for today.

time.title: Time is the most valuable currency
time.text: We built Matcher because job hunting shouldn't take weeks. No endless forms, no scattered applications. Tell us what you want ‚Äî we connect you with real entry-level opportunities in minutes.

simplicity.title: Simplicity is the new standard
simplicity.text: No CV required. No cover letters. No gatekeeping. Just a few taps to set your preferences ‚Äî then swipe, match, and start the conversation. Hiring and getting hired should be straightforward.

global.title: Globally inspired. Locally grounded.
global.text: We took the best from modern hiring platforms around the world and tailored them for Georgia. Language, salary expectations, locations, work types ‚Äî all designed for how things work here.

life.title: Built for the way life works today
life.text: Part-time, full-time, remote, or on-site. First job or career switch. We meet you where you are and match you with employers who get it.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: We believe everyone deserves a fair shot at meaningful work. By removing friction from the hiring process, we help candidates find their next opportunity ‚Äî and employers find the right people ‚Äî faster and easier.

future.title: The future
future.text: We're just getting started. As we grow, we'll keep listening, improving, and expanding to serve more job seekers and employers across Georgia and beyond.

contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.subtitle: Get in touch for partnerships, press, or general enquiries.
contactPage.name: Name
contactPage.subject: Subject
contactPage.successMessage: Thanks! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contactPage.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Building the simplest way to get hired ‚Äî from Georgia, for today's world.
team.intro: Matcher is built by a small, focused team that believes hiring should be faster, clearer, and more human. We're obsessed with time and simplicity ‚Äî because those are the most valuable things today.
team.whyText: Entry-level hiring is one of the most important parts of the economy ‚Äî yet it remains one of the most outdated. Too many people are stuck in systems that are slow, complicated, and unfair. We built Matcher so people can find real work faster ‚Äî with dignity and ease.
team.globalText: Matcher is proudly built in Georgia, designed with global product standards, and grounded in local reality. We understand how hiring actually works here ‚Äî in retail, hospitality, and service roles ‚Äî and we're building infrastructure that can scale beyond borders.
team.globalHighlight: Globally local means: world-class experience, local understanding.
values: Time is the most valuable currency of modern life.
Simplicity wins ‚Äî technology should remove friction, not add it.
Everyone deserves a fair start, especially for a first job.
Today matters ‚Äî opportunities move fast, so hiring should too.
team.swipeHint: Swipe or tap to meet the team.

ketevan.name: Ketevan Ioseliani
ketevan.reasonToBelieve: 20+ years in legal & admin. Built trust and long-term sustainability into Matcher.
ketevan.text: Ketevan brings 20+ years of experience in legal, administrative, and organizational leadership. She ensures Matcher is built on strong foundations of trust, compliance, and long-term sustainability ‚Äî for both job seekers and employers.

nino.name: Nino Kuprashvili
nino.reasonToBelieve: 20+ years building trusted platforms in Georgia. Keeps Matcher radically simple.
nino.text: Founder and product-driven entrepreneur with 20+ years of experience in business, marketing, and building trusted platforms in Georgia. Nino leads Matcher's vision, user experience, and growth ‚Äî keeping the product radically simple and built for real people.

david.name: David Tskhvariashvili
david.reasonToBelieve: Senior-of-seniors. Turns vision into reliable, production-grade product.
david.text: Senior-of-seniors full-stack developer with deep expertise in building scalable, production-grade platforms. David leads Matcher's engineering execution, architecture, and infrastructure ‚Äî turning a fast-moving vision into a reliable product ready to scale.

team.closingHeading: Building for the next generation of work
team.closingText: Matcher is not just a platform ‚Äî it's infrastructure for entry-level work. We're building a future where people get hired faster, employers hire smarter, and the process feels simple, clear, and fair.
team.closingLine: From Georgia. For today. Ready for the world.
team.lastCardSubtext: Small team, big mission ‚Äî building the future of entry-level hiring in Georgia.
team.lastCardLine: From Georgia. For today. Ready for the world.

home.heroSubtitle: No CV. No endless searching. Tell Matcher what you want ‚Äî we instantly connect you with real entry-level jobs in Georgia.

home.readySubtitle: Join job seekers across Georgia ‚Äî no CV, no endless scrolling.

nini.quote: I had no experience and no CV. Matcher showed me three barista roles ‚Äî I got the first one in three days.
nini.name: Nini

giorgi.quote: Finally something that doesn't ask for years of experience. Applied in one click and got a call the same week.

mariam.quote: Searched for part-time for months. Here I got matched in two minutes and hired within a week.

employer.title: Hire candidates
employer.subtitle: Register your company to manage vacancies, or post a job now without an account.
employer.registerDesc: Create an account with your company details to post and manage multiple vacancies.
employer.postVacancyDesc: Post a job right away. Candidates swipe to match ‚Äî no registration required.

login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Choose your account type, then sign in with email and password.

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to set a new password.
forgotPassword.successMessage: If an account exists with this email, we've sent you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Choose a new password (at least 8 characters).
resetPassword.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters.
resetPassword.successMessage: Password updated. You can sign in now.
resetPassword.invalidOrExpired: This link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.

step1.title: What job are you looking for?
step1.subtitle: Pick one ‚Äî we'll suggest skills and matches based on it.

step2.title: Do you have experience?
step2.subtitle: No problem either way ‚Äî this just improves matching.
step2.experiencePlaceholder: Example: 6 months as a cashier, summer job in a cafe, internship‚Ä¶
step2.experienceHint: Keep it short ‚Äî 1‚Äì2 lines is enough for MVP.

step3.title: What schedule do you want?
step3.subtitle: Choose one. You can change later.

step4.title: Pick your skills
step4.searchSkillsPlaceholder: Search or type your own skill‚Ä¶
step4.subtitle: Select 1‚Äì5 skills ‚Äî then choose a level for each.
step4.tip: Tip: choose your strongest skills first.
step4.selectAtLeast: Select at least one skill above.

step5.title: Where do you want to work?
step5.subtitle: Type your city (and pick a district if in Tbilisi). Employers will see this.
step5.cityPlaceholder: Type a few letters, e.g. Tbi, Bat, Kut‚Ä¶
step5.noCitiesFound: No cities found. Try different letters.
step5.willingToRelocate: Are you willing to relocate for a job?

step6.title: What salary do you expect?
step6.subtitle: Enter your desired monthly salary in GEL. We'll show the average from current vacancies.
step6.validNumber: Please enter a valid positive number.

step7.title: What's your education level?
step7.subtitle: Select your highest level of education. Employers may use this to match with you.

step8.title: Create your profile
step8.subtitle: One quick step ‚Äî then we'll show your top matches.
step8.passwordPlaceholder: At least 8 characters (you'll use this to log in)
step8.validPhone: Please enter a valid phone number.
step8.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters.

userFlow.mvpNoteText: Skills mapping is hardcoded for now ‚Äî we'll move it into the DB next.
